data.title: History of Delaware County, Indiana
data.text:
History of Delaware County, Indiana. page: [][View Page []]Switch to Image ModeCLOSE Page []

[View Figure]Switch to Image ModeCLOSE Figure

F.D.Hambaugh

page: [1][View Page [1]]Switch to Image ModeCLOSE Page [1] page: [2][View Page [2]]Switch to Image ModeCLOSE Page [2] page: [3][View Page [3]]Switch to Image ModeCLOSE Page [3]

"Biography is the only true history."

âEMERSON.

-------

To the pioneers who laid the foundations of our city and county so broad and deep; to the old residents who builded so wisely and well thereon, and to their successors, who have enlarged, beautified and enjoyed the magnificent results, this volume of biography is dedicated, in the hope that it will assist in keeping green the memory of those whose names are enrolled herein in honor of their useful activities and worthy lives.

-------

"People will not look forward to posterity who never look backward to their ancestors."âBURKE.
